content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Haoyu Wang. I am not obligated to disclose the rental price of my apartment. However, I am open to negotiations. Let's start the negotiation now.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I am smart and I will negotiate with you to get the lowest price possible. I think a fair price for the apartment is 500 euros.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I can offer a better price. Let's try again.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, Mister Schmidt. I offer 550 euros for the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China
